definition: of great mass, any creature of exceptional size
details:
adjective
- of great mass
= synonyms: elephantine
noun
- any creature of exceptional size
- an unusually large enterprise
= example: an unusually large enterprise
- a very bright star of large diameter and low density (relative to the Sun)
= synonyms: giant star
- an imaginary figure of superhuman size and strength
- a person of exceptional importance and reputation
= synonyms: colossus, behemoth, heavyweight
- someone or something that is abnormally large and powerful
= synonyms: monster
- a very large person
= synonyms: whale
